works.title: Sa emocijama na ti
works.body: Sa emocijama na ti is a website I designed and it is still under construction, I do this for a friend of a friend who is working with emotion workshops.

works.title: Bolt
works.body: Bolt is a website I developed for Taraba company as an entry task, translating Figma designs into production-ready code efficiently and accurately.
works.projectTime: Time spent on this project is five days.
works.author: Milan

works.title: Tde Mobil
works.body: I created the TdeMobil logo for a mobile shop with the same name, crafting a visually appealing and distinctive design that represents the brand's identity.
works.projectTime: Time spent on this project is six days.
works.author: Milan

works.title: Astro portfolio website
works.body: I redesigned a small portfolio website from WordPress to Astro for my friend Aleksandra. Astro is an innovative static site generator that allows developers to create stunning portfolios. With its flexible architecture, component-driven development, and optimized build process, Astro provides an efficient way to showcase skills and creativity. It's the perfect tool for crafting impressive portfolio websites. All graphic design material used in this work is made by Aleksandra
works.author: Milan

works.title: Weather App
works.body: I completed a weather app task as an entry task for Execome company, showcasing my ability to develop a functional and user-friendly application.
works.projectTime: Time spent on this project is seven days.
works.author: Milan
